009package Ch06_Corner_Detection;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
016import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
017import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
018import imagingbook.common.corners.GradientCornerDetector.Parameters;
019import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
020import imagingbook.common.corners.MopsCornerDetector;
021import imagingbook.common.corners.ShiTomasiCornerDetector;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
026import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
027
028import java.util.List;
029
030import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
031
032/**
033 * <p>
034 * ImageJ plugin which demonstrates the use of gradient corner detectors (Harris, MOPS, Sho-Tomasi), optionally using
035 * sub-pixel positioning. See Ch. 6 of [1] for additional details. Detected corners are shown as a vector overlay on top
036 * of the original image.
037 * </p>
038 * <p>
039 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
040 * (2022).
041 * </p>
042 *
043 * @author WB
044 * @version 2022/03/30
045 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
046 * @see MopsCornerDetector
047 * @see ShiTomasiCornerDetector
048 * @see ShapeOverlayAdapter
049 */
050public class Find_Corners implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
051        
052        public enum DetectorType {
053                Harris, Mops, ShiThomasi;
054        }
055        
056        /** Detection algorithm to use. */
057        public static DetectorType Algorithm = DetectorType.Harris;
058        /** Number of corners to show (0 = all). */
059        public static int MaxCornerCount = 0;   
060        /** Size of the graphic corner marks. */
061        public static double CornerMarkSize = 1.0;
062        /** Stroke width used for graphic corner marks. */
063        public static double CornerMarkStrokeWidth = 0.25;
064        /** Color used for graphic corner marks. */
065        public static BasicAwtColor CornerMarkColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
066        /** Set true to display the corner scores as an image. */
067        public static boolean ShowCornerScoreImage = false;
068
069        private final static Parameters params = new Parameters();
070
071        private ImagePlus im;
072
073        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
074        public Find_Corners() {
075                if (noCurrentImage()) {
076                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.IrishManor);
077                }
078        }
079        
080        @Override
081    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
082        this.im = im;
083        return DOES_ALL;
084    }
085    
086        @Override
087    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
088                if (!runDialog()) {
089                        return;
090                }
091                
092                GradientCornerDetector detector = null; 
093                switch (Algorithm) {
094                case Harris:
095                        detector = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
096                        break;
097                case Mops:
098                        detector = new MopsCornerDetector(ip, params);
099                        break;
100                case ShiThomasi:
101                        detector = new ShiTomasiCornerDetector(ip, params);
102                        break;
103                }
104                
105                List<Corner> corners = detector.getCorners();
106                
107                // create a vector overlay to mark the resulting corners
108                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
109                ola.setStroke(new ColoredStroke(CornerMarkStrokeWidth, CornerMarkColor.getColor()));
110                
111                int cnt = 0;
112                for (Corner c : corners) {
113                        ola.addShape(c.getShape(CornerMarkSize));
114                        //IJ.log(c.toString());
115                        cnt++;
116                        if (MaxCornerCount > 0 && cnt >= MaxCornerCount) break;
117                }
118                
119                im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
120
121                if (ShowCornerScoreImage) {
122                        new ImagePlus("Corner Score (Q)", detector.getQ()).show();
123                }
124    }
125    
126        private boolean runDialog() {
127                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
128                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
129                gd.addEnumChoice("Detector type", Algorithm);
130                DialogUtils.addToDialog(params, gd);
131                gd.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", MaxCornerCount, 0);
132                gd.addNumericField("Corners display size", CornerMarkSize, 1);
133                gd.addEnumChoice("Corner color", CornerMarkColor);
134                gd.addCheckbox("Show corner score image", ShowCornerScoreImage);
135                
136                gd.showDialog();
137                if (gd.wasCanceled())
138                        return false;
139                
140                Algorithm = gd.getNextEnumChoice(DetectorType.class);
141                DialogUtils.getFromDialog(params, gd);
142                MaxCornerCount = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
143                CornerMarkSize = gd.getNextNumber();
144                CornerMarkColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
145                ShowCornerScoreImage = gd.getNextBoolean();
146                return true;
147        }
148}
